SEARCH
Package lighting

Class SpotLight

java.lang.Object
lighting.Light
lighting.PointLight
lighting.SpotLight
All Implemented Interfaces:
LightSource
public class SpotLight extends PointLight
Represents a spot light source in a scene, which emits light in a specific direction from a point.

  • Constructor Details

    • SpotLight

      public SpotLight(Color intensity, Point position, Vector direction)
      Constructs a spot light with a given intensity, position, and direction.
      Parameters:
      intensity - the intensity of the spot light
      position - the position of the spot light in 3D space
      direction - the direction in which the spot light is pointing
